analysis.description:

BaseAdvertisement.upgradeFinance (/unique_chucks/10/0x98036ec006f44d490570c97b626190479d3a1443.sol#1140-1162) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(initBalance == newBalance)
	- require(bool)(oldBalance == 0)
